title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, June 26, 2013
teaser: There's a new gaming console in town, the Ouya. Its crowdfunded Kickstarter campaign had 60,000 backers -- and the console only costs $100. While the Ouya won't put Microsoft or Sony out of business, it will likely find an audience. And why did Edward Snowden ask his lawyers to store their phones in freezers?
